mapper.select: SELECT DEPARTMENT, SUM(CASE WHEN T.USER_PROPERTY = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WORK_SHOP, SUM(CASE WHEN T.USER_PROPERTY = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) OFFICE, COUNT(1) TOTAL, SUM(CASE WHEN T.SCHEDULE IS NULL OR T.SCHEDULE = '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) SCHEDULE_NULL, SUM(CASE WHEN T.SCHEDULE = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) SCHEDULE_DAY_TIME, SUM(CASE WHEN T.SCHEDULE = 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) SCHEDULE_DAY_TIME_12, SUM(CASE WHEN T.SCHEDULE = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) SCHEDULE_EVENING, SUM(CASE WHEN T.SCHEDULE = 4 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) SCHEDULE_EVENING_12 FROM MP_USER T WHERE T.PROFESSION != '101' AND T.STATE = 0 GROUP BY DEPARTMENT ORDER BY DEPARTMENT

SELECT DEPARTMENT, PROFESSION, SUM(CASE WHEN T.USER_PROPERTY = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WORK_SHOP, SUM(CASE WHEN T.USER_PROPERTY = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) OFFICE, COUNT(1) TOTAL FROM MP_USER T WHERE T.PROFESSION != '101' AND T.STATE = 0 GROUP BY DEPARTMENT, PROFESSION ORDER BY DEPARTMENT, PROFESSION
